ygData.subject: Illusions- Why and Why not
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello... I have found that illusions work in conjunction with faction. For instance I m a gnome enchantress, my faction in steamfont and ak anon can go no
ygData.messageBody:
Hello...
I have found that illusions work in conjunction with faction. For instance I'm a gnome enchantress, my faction in steamfont and ak'anon can go no higher and I've found that no matter what form I take, skeleton or ogre, I'm still amiable with everyone. I've tried every form from lvl one to 24 and it never changers. I've also found you can get the nest prices by using race illusion, benevolence, and charisma buff. I have tested this in many cities checking to make sure it was right. I've also found that in some places no matter what you do you can't change you're faction at all with spells. Go to different zones and play around you'll see what I mean. Here's an example; in oasis at the inn I was attacked and I was in gnome form and the keeper did nothing, so I changed into human, he still did nothing, I cast benevolence on him, he then attacked the offend creature. I did this as part of my test, it was a low green so I wasn't worried but I think you kind of get what I'm talking about....

Signed
Zytreen Matrixmistress, Gnome Enchantress, Senior Officer of the Soldiers of Brell
